hero.title: Unlock Daoist Fortune Balance the Five Elements Transform Your Life
hero.subtitle: Uncover ancient Chinese metaphysics. Explore yin–yang balance, qi circulation, and the wisdom of the I Ching to change your life journey. These timeless teachings guided countless seekers—and can inspire you today.

palm.sectionDesc: Upload a clear photo of your palm and we will interpret your Five-Element fortune with Daoist insights

upload.title: Provide Your Palm Photo
upload.tips: Take or upload a clear palm photo (natural light, palm up, fingers naturally spread)
upload.disabled: Please upload a palm photo first
upload.cameraError: Cannot access camera, please check browser permissions or use image upload
upload.noImageError: No image uploaded, please select a clear palm photo first

result.title: Your Five-Element Reading
result.desc: Based on AI analysis of your palm lines combined with Daoist Five-Element theory, here are your element distribution and current fortune insights:
result.defaultAdvice: Your palm lines show potential Metal element deficiency in the Five Elements, which can be balanced through appropriate methods.
result.defaultCareer: Wood and Fire elements are strong, indicating good action and creativity.
result.defaultWealth: Metal element deficiency may affect wealth accumulation.
result.defaultHealth: Pay attention to daily routine and respiratory system, maintain Yin-Yang balance.

items.title: Unlucky Year?
items.desc: Obstacles everywhere—failed investments, workplace setbacks, family conflicts? Tai Sui may be disturbing your qi field.
items.solution: Priest-drawn Tai Sui talismans embedded in bracelets to neutralize annual afflictions and remove obstacles.

items.title: Weak Wealth Luck?
items.desc: Hard work yet no savings? Projects always one step short? A deficiency in Metal may disperse wealth qi.
items.solution: Wealth talisman + fortune bracelet to attract wealth—steady main income, more side income.

items.title: Restless Mind & Body?
items.desc: Insomnia, social tension, frequent minor accidents? Imbalance of the Five Elements may invite negative energy.
items.solution: Safety talisman + corresponding element bracelet to balance qi and ward off petty people.

calc.title: Five-Element Reading: Traditional, Precise
calc.point: Palm photo reading: upload a clear palm photo; we analyze lines and complexion and produce results in 3 minutes.

bracelet.title: Custom Bracelet: Talisman + Beads
bracelet.talismanDesc: Display three talisman styles (hand-drawn by priests vs. printed), marked "Blessed through Triple Purification and Nine Kowtow Ceremony"

valueAdded.title: Value-Added Services
descriptions: Free copy of 'Personal Five-Element Fortune Manual' with personality, health, and annual trend analysis (manual cover features Daoist talisman borders)
Annual bracelet return service for collective chanting ceremonies at partner temples, includes blessing certificate (shows temple chanting scene)
Bracelet replacement and string repair for material cost only, regular 'Five-Element Fortune Tips' newsletter (includes priest handwriting maintenance guide)

items.title: Orthodox Taoism
items.description: Partner temple certification display (includes temple photos + priest certification numbers), emphasizing "talisman drawing follows Daoist Canon protocols"

items.title: Authentic Materials

items.title: Personalized Experience

modal.title: Recommended Plans
modal.recommendationDesc: Based on your Five-Element deficiencies and current fortune, combined with Daoist traditions and seasonal characteristics, we recommend the following luck bracelets:
modal.productDesc: Main bead uses natural white crystal (Metal). Paired with 925 silver accessories and wealth talisman tube, blessed by priests. Ideal for those lacking Metal to enhance wealth luck and decisiveness.
modal.wearingAdvice: Recommended to wear the bracelet on your left hand (left in, right out), wear for at least 8 hours daily. Remove when sleeping and place on bedside table. Rinse the bracelet with clean water on the 1st and 15th of each lunar month to enhance its energy field.

othersList.title: Silver Obsidian Five-Element Harmony Bracelet
othersList.desc: Silver obsidian with Five-Element bracelet to balance qi; especially suitable for autumn wear.

othersList.title: Five-Element Bagua Fortune Bracelet
othersList.desc: Includes gemstones corresponding to the Five Elements and Bagua talisman; balances fortune year-round.
